artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Orange & yellow warp. Yellow, tan & metallic copper weft forms narrow bands. Twill. Rt. selvedge. Inside folder reads "U5A-Pomegranate, custom, 50", wool-cotton-metlon"  Tag inside folder reads: Pomegranite, HUY/4A/1, 50", wool, cotton, jute, Metlon Custom  (orange, yellow, tan,copper metallic)
title: Pomegranate
